message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO

This paper deals with computer vision and graphics, specifically with generating images of objects from arbitrary viewpoints. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also mentions 3D models and point clouds, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.GR (Computer Graphics). The use of a convolutional network for image generation indicates that it could be classified under cs.LG (Machine Learning), while the implicit 3D representation of object classes suggests cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the ability to predict 3D point clouds and fuse them into a surface mesh implies that the paper could also be relevant to cs.RO (Robotics).
